channel.title: Pathfinding error
channel.description: Ok so i have my pi source and pathfinding is messed up, most monsters when u attack u run away in a random direction or for some you have to stand right next to it to attack it, it doesnt automaticly go to it and attacks, you need to be standing right next to it to attack it

item.title: Pathfinding error
item.dc:creator: @alberto2man alberto2man
item.description:
@alberto2man wrote:

Ok so i have my pi source and pathfinding is messed up, most monsters when u attack u run away in a random direction or for some you have to stand right next to it to attack it, it doesnt automaticly go to it and attacks, you need to be standing right next to it to attack it
